articles.author: AS English
articles.title: Coronavirus: Stick-on throat patch that detects Covid-19 symptoms - AS English
articles.description: Researchers in the US are developing a wearable throat sensor designed to detect signs of Covid-19 and monitor the progress of sufferers.
articles.content:
A stick-on throat sensor being developed in the United States may be able to spot early signs of Covid-19 and monitor not only the progress of coronavirus sufferers, but also the health of the medical staff exposed to them.
